Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away M distance from Feraligatr.

Attacks.Name: Crunch
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, reduce the target character's Defense by 1 until the end of their next activation and the target gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Aqua Jet
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Feraligatr may make an immediate move action.

Attacks.Name: Ice Punch
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Freeze special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Torrent
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 3 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of all its Water-type attacks by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Intimidate
Superpowers.Effect: All enemy characters within range and line of sight reduce their attack Strength by 1 until the end of their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Liquidation
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, reduce the target character's Defense by 1 for the rest of the game.

Superpowers.Name: Rage
Superpowers.Effect: When this character takes damage, it gains 1 power and adds 1 die to its next attack roll.

Superpowers.Name: Aqua Rush
Superpowers.Effect: Feraligatr immediately makes a move action and may make an attack action after moving. During this move, it can move through characters without penalty. This superpower can be used only once per turn.
